definition[0]: metal sheets that are as thin as paper, used for wrapping food
example[0]: Cover the chicken with silver foil and bake.
definition[1]: paper that is covered with very thin sheets of metal
definition[2]: a light narrow sword used in fencing
definition[3]: to prevent something bad that someone is planning to do
example[2]: A massive arms-smuggling plan has been foiled by the CIA.
explanation[0]: Foil is often used in the passive
